instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
instructions.2: Toss potatoes, olive oil, Parmesan cheese, and rosemary together in a bowl; season with salt and black pepper. Spread onto the prepared baking sheet.
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes; stir, then continue baking until golden brown and tender, about 20 minutes more.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
